title: Will it lag though?
body:
Hey guys, I'm planning on moving my account to another region. Probably Japan... 

I was wondering if i would experience really bad lag. I usually have 40 ping during all my games. What do you think? Good idea?

replies.body: Mmmmmm trying to play on the JP servers while *physically* outside of Japan is going to cause that ping to go up for sure. Just how much nobody can be 100% sure of. It's best to play in the region you're in geographically to make sure you have the best connection you can get.

Best way to know what the ping would be is to play on it.
Make a new account for that server and play a tutorial or custom game. They still show your ping accurately, and won't disrupt other players if you're getting unplayable levels of latency.
